rows.label: tlk70000014_03_msg0001
rows.name:
I'm not sure how much it comes across,
but it takes a lot for me to put my
trust in someone.

rows.label: tlk70000014_03_msg0002
rows.name:
People who look kind on the outside
might actually be rotten to the core.
How are you supposed to know?

rows.label: tlk70000014_03_msg0003
rows.name:
I don't like how easy it is for us to keep
secrets from one another. To lie to
one another.

rows.label: tlk70000014_03_msg0004
rows.name:
Maybe I'm just not a very good judge
of character. It's hard for me to see
through to a person's true nature...

rows.label: tlk70000014_03_msg0005
rows.name:
Someone took advantage of me once
and I lost a lot of money. That's when I
learned how nasty people can be.

rows.label: tlk70000014_03_msg0006
rows.name:
I don't want to forget what happened,
but I also don't want to dwell on it...
I haven't got time for people like that.

rows.label: tlk70000014_03_msg0007
rows.name:
My experiences have helped me learn.
Now I want to take that knowledge and
use it to become a better person.

rows.label: tlk70000014_03_msg0008
rows.name:
Laura, Hikari, thank you for helping me
understand that trust isn't a one-way
street
